headline: 'Safety Is Always First': NASA Reschedules Artemis Moon Mission To Saturday
short_description: “We’re going to play all nine innings here,” the Artemis mission manager said after the first launch was scrubbed.

headline: Secret Service Official And Ex-Trump Aide Tony Ornato Retires Amid Jan. 6 Probe
short_description: Ornato, who at one point served as a White House political adviser, is said to have witnessed Trump lunge at a Secret Service agent during the Capitol attack.

headline: 'The Vow Part Two' Trailer Dives Deeper Into Downfall Of Twisted NXIVM Cult
short_description: HBO will release a six-part follow up to the series beginning in October about the infamous sex cult led by Keith Raniere.

headline: This Breastfeeding Condition Makes Moms Feel Dread, Disgust And Despair
short_description: Moms with dysphoric milk-ejection reflex (D-MER) feel an intense but brief wave of depression, anxiety or other negative emotion before letdown. And it's more common than you might think.

headline: Yung Gravy Brings Addison Rae’s Mom As His VMAs Date, Calls Her A Certain 4-Letter Word
short_description: The TikTok star’s mom Sheri Easterling and the “Betty” rapper made their romance public — but her ex, Monty Lopez, is not happy about it.

headline: House Members Are Using A Controversial Tool To Keep Campaigning. Has It Gone Too Far?
short_description: House members are only supposed to use proxy voting when they cannot be present due to COVID-19. But that's not stopping representatives from voting remotely on the campaign trail.

headline: Lindsey Graham Warns Of 'Riots In Streets' If Trump Is Charged Over Classified Docs
short_description: “Most Republicans, including me, believe when it comes to Trump, there is no law," Graham said on Fox News. "It's all about getting him."

headline: Amber Heard's Sister Reacts To 'Disgusting' Johnny Depp Cameo At VMAs
short_description: The “Pirates of the Caribbean” actor appeared virtually as the MTV Video Music Awards' Moon Person on Sunday night.

headline: Johnny Depp Makes Surprise Appearance As Moon Person At MTV VMAs
short_description: The actor made his first on-camera appearance since the defamation verdict against ex-wife Amber Heard in June.

headline: And The Award For Most Enthusiastic VMAs Guest Goes To Taylor Swift
short_description: The singer channeled her inner Barb, danced along to Lizzo and fangirled over Blackpink.

headline: Pakistan Flooding Deaths Pass 1,000 In 'Climate Catastrophe'
short_description: Pakistani authorities reported the casualties since the monsoon season began earlier than normal this year, destroying nearly 300,000 homes.

headline: 2022 MTV VMAs Red Carpet: All The Wildest Looks You Need To See
short_description: Celebrities showed up and showed out at the awards Sunday night in New Jersey.

headline: A Nebraska Man Conducted An Active Shooter Drill. Employees Had No Idea.
short_description: A man hired to organize what looked like a mass shooting has been charged with multiple terrorism counts.

headline: Kash Patel Says His Life's In Danger Because He's In FBI Affidavit
short_description: In a message posted on Truth Social, Patel called it a “vicious attack from DOJ/FBI."

headline: FBI Probing Russian-Speaking Fake Heiress Who Infiltrated Mar-A-Lago: Report
short_description: The startling case underscores the security challenges of Donald Trump’s resort even as the former president stashed top-secret U.S. government files there.

headline: Arcade Fire Singer Win Butler Accused Of Sexual Misconduct By Several People: Report
short_description: Butler told Pitchfork he had "consensual relationships" outside his marriage, but he disputed details of the allegations.

headline: Don Jr. Posts 'Dick Pic' Of Dad After Affidavit Release: 'Redact This!'
short_description: "Hang in there, Mr. President," goofs one die-hard fan.

headline: Trump Attorneys File Do-Over Motion Regarding Mar-A-Lago Search
short_description: The former president's legal team followed a judge's order to polish a filing about the FBI seizure of government documents from his estate.

headline: 6 Missing College Students In Mexico Were Held In Warehouse, Killed By Army
short_description: Six of 43 students kidnapped in 2014 were kept alive for days before being handed over to a local army commander who ordered them to be killed, according to a new report.
authors: Fabiola Sánchez and Christopher Sherman, AP

headline: A Fisherman Thought He Caught A Rock. He Snagged A Prehistoric Treasure Instead.
short_description: The Nebraska man said he initially believed the underwater find was the skeleton of a catfish or deer.

headline: Jared Kushner Blasts 'Nasty Troll' Chrissy Teigen For Attacks On Ivanka
short_description: Who's nasty??

headline: 'Kimmel' Host Nikki Glaser Absolutely Goes There In Scorching NSFW Monologue
short_description: No one was safe during her "speed roast" targeting politicians.

headline: Mar-A-Lago Search Affidavit: Trump Was Insecurely Storing Most Sensitive Intel At Club
short_description: The heavily redacted document lays out the justification the Department of Justice provided to a judge for permission to search for and seize highly classified documents in an FBI raid of Trump's Florida home.

headline: Donald Trump's Truth Social Reportedly Faces Major Money, Trademark Woes
short_description: A major vendor claims it was stiffed by Trump's social media operation, suggesting finances are in "significant disarray," reported Fox Business.

headline: FINISH HIM: Fighting Kangaroo Pulls Wild Move Right Out Of A Video Game
short_description: Two mad marsupials went at it in a Canberra nature reserve.

headline: 6 Months Into War, Russian Goods Still Flowing To U.S.
short_description: American companies — including federal contractors — continue to buy everything from birch wood flooring to weapons-grade titanium from Russian corporations.
authors: Juliet Linderman and Martha Mendoza, AP

headline: Judge Temporarily Blocks North Dakota Trigger Law Banning Abortion
short_description: The ban was set to take effect Friday, about two months after the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade.
